alert.note: Alert for Knox; NW Blount (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:48PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Knox and northwestern Blount Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 348 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Louisville, or 7 miles northwest of Alcoa. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Knoxville, Alcoa, Farragut, Louisville, Rockford, Eagleton Village and Bearden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
